name: Aerius (itch)
description:
A game about the sky. A duel with a massive foe. A fight for the skylands.

The Grand Zeppelin bears its terrible shadow across the peaceful villages of your home. Strap in and take to the skies to defeat its colossal menace in your attack bi-plane. Destroy components around the Grand Zeppelin, collect the scrap, and make it back to your hangar to upgrade your weapons to destroy even higher tiers of the Zeppelin's defences. 

Watch out though, you'll be constantly pursued by fighter planes launched from the Zeppelin in its defence.
